data.eml:eml: The ant genus Linepithema (Formicidae: Dolichoderinae) in Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Escárraga, Mayron, Guerrero, Roberto J. (2016): The ant genus Linepithema (Formicidae: Dolichoderinae) in Colombia. Zootaxa 4208 (5): 446-458, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4208.5.3
